name: Darkflight Heart
effect: Your team counts as having 1 additional Darkflight. Gain an Aphelios.

name: Lagoon Heart
effect: Your team counts as having 1 additional Lagoon. Gain a Kai'Sa.

name: Soul Siphon
effect: Darkflights benefit from the top-most trait of the sacrificed unit. This does not increase the trait count for that trait.

name: Base Camp
effect: Scalescorns gain 8% damage each time they start combat in the same hex, stacking up to 4 times. Gain a Lillia.

name: Birthday Present
effect: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).

name: Darkflight Crest
effect: Gain a Darkflight Emblem and a Rell.

name: Dragon Imperialist
effect: If you only have 1 Dragon, Dragons execute enemies they damage who are below 25% Health. Gain a Nomsy.

name: Dragonmancer Conference
effect: After combat with a player, a random Dragonmancer appears on your bench. Gain a Kai'sa.

name: Essence Theft
effect: Mages' attacks drain 8 Mana from their target and gain half of the drained Mana. Gain a Lux.

name: Hero-In-Training
effect: The Dragonmancer nearest to the Dragonmancer Hero gains 50% of the Dragonmancer trait's bonuses. Gain a Sett.

name: High Tide
effect: Until they cast 2 times, Lagoon champions have 30% reduced Attack Speed but gain 12 Mana per second. Gain a Kai'sa.

name: Lagoon Crest
effect: Gain a Lagoon Emblem and a Zac.
